text: 7|35|Ātamuṭaiya makkaḷē! (Eṉ) tūtarkaḷ uṅkaḷil iruntē niccayamāka uṅkaḷiṭam vantu eṉ vacaṉaṅkaḷai meyyākavē uṅkaḷukku ōtik kāṇpikkumpōtu, (avaṟṟai ceviyuṟṟa uṅkaḷil) evarkaḷ allāhvukkup payantu, (pāvaṅkaḷiliruntu) vilaki, naṟceyalkaḷaic ceykiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷukku ettakaiya payamumillai; avarkaḷ tuyaram aṭaiyavum māṭṭārkaḷ
